Name: Nance-Horan syndrome
Definition: A X-linked dominant disease that has_material_basis_in mutation in the NHS gene on chromosome Xp22 and is characterized by congenital cataract leading to profound vision loss

Name: obsolete hereditary motor and sensory neuropathy with agenesis of the corpus callosum
Definition: A X-linked dominant disease that has_material_basis_in mutation in the NHS gene on chromosome Xp22 and is characterized by congenital cataract leading to profound vision loss

Name: Christianson syndrome
Definition: A syndromic X-linked intellectual disability characterized by severe developmental delay

Name: congenital disorder of glycosylation type IIm
Definition: A congenital disorder of glycosylation type II that is characterized by infantile onset seizures

Name: early infantile epileptic encephalopathy 36
Definition: An early infantile epileptic encephalopathy characterized by X-linked dominant inheritance of infantile onset of seizures

Name: Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease X-linked dominant 6
Definition: A Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease X-linked that has_material_basis_in mutation in the PDK3 gene on chromosome Xp22.

Name: Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease X-linked dominant 1
Definition: A Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease X-linked that has_material_basis_in hemizygous or heterozygous mutation in the GJB1 gene on chromosome Xq13.

Name: fragile X syndrome
Definition: A X-linked dominant disease that is characterized by moderate to severe mental retardation

Name: craniofrontonasal syndrome
Definition: A X-linked dominant disease that has_material_basis_in mutation in the EFNB1 gene on chromosome Xq13 and is characterized in hemizygous males by hypertelorism and with greater severity in females by frontonasal dysplasia

Name: obsolete progressive high-tone neural deafness
Definition: A X-linked dominant disease that has_material_basis_in mutation in the EFNB1 gene on chromosome Xq13 and is characterized in hemizygous males by hypertelorism and with greater severity in females by frontonasal dysplasia

Name: focal dermal hypoplasia
Definition: A X-linked dominant disease characterized at birth by streaks of very thin skin (dermal hypoplasia)

Name: Coffin-Lowry syndrome
Definition: An X-linked dominant disease that is characterized by skeletal malformations
